title: Roads, Railways, Parks, Beaches off-limits during curfew: Gazette
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); President Gotabaya Rajapaksa has issued an extraordinary gazette declaring that no person shall be on any public road, railway, public park, public recreation ground or other public ground or the seashore in such areas, during the period of the curfew.
Ramazan fast to begin tonight (2), announces the Colombo Grand Mosque
